title: CSL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 140 Apprentice Posts
description: The Cochin Shipyard Limited (CSL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 140 Graduate Apprentice and Technician Apprentice Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Mechanical, Computer Science, Electrical, and Electronics Engineering, can apply for the CSL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online...
